benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Bypass Cover
effects: Your ranged attacks with weapons ignore Half Cover and Three-Quarters Cover.

benefits.name: Firing in Melee
effects: Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with Ranged weapons.

benefits.name: Long Shots
effects: Attacking at long range doesn't impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with Ranged weapons.
